item.title: Testing your rake tasks
item.description: This is the second part of my previous post Improving our rake tasks. In this one we will discuss a way for testing our rake task, the example will be very straight forward.

item.title: Improving our rake tasks
item.description: Lately I have been writting some rake tasks, for downloading backups, for accesing API’s, or for automating teadious and repetitive work.
